name: Corgi Christmas Adventure
description:
Take control over an adorable Corgi and shoot presents at your foes to pacify them!

Features:

  • A Corgi!
  • A Corgi with a present-cannon!
  • Doing flips!
    • double jump to do a happy flip!
  • Handpainted level backgrounds in simplistic pixel-style!
  • Overwhelm enemies with gifts!

Controls:
Space: Jump
W/D: Left/Right
Shift: Drop off ledge
Click or Ctrl: Fire gift
